Agendas and Minutes

Instrucciones para el Español

Official resolutions, ordinances, minutes, and distributed agenda materials are retained in the City Document Center
Yakima City Council meetings prior to June 2024 are available on Novus Agenda
Meeting information following this date can be found on this page listed below.

View Past Meetings
in Novus
